javadoc:
Methods for notifications when changes are made to a domain folder or
 a domain file.

methods.javadoc:
Notification that a folder is added to parent.
@param folder domain folder which was just added.
methods.name: domainFolderAdded
methods.comment: Notification that a folder is added to parent.

params.name: folder
params.comment: domain folder which was just added.

methods.name: domainFileAdded
methods.comment:
Notification that a file is added to parent folder. You can
 get the parent from the file.

params.name: file
params.comment: domain file which was just added.

methods.name: domainFolderRemoved
methods.comment: Notification that a domain folder is removed.

params.name: parent
params.comment: domain folder which contained the folder that was just removed.

params.name: name
params.comment: the name of the folder that was removed.

methods.name: domainFileRemoved
methods.comment: Notification that a file was removed

params.name: parent
params.comment: domain folder which contained the file that was just removed.

params.name: name
params.comment: the name of the file that was removed.

methods.name: domainFolderRenamed
methods.comment: Notify listeners when a domain folder is renamed.

methods.name: domainFileRenamed
methods.comment: Notification that the domain file was renamed.

methods.name: domainFolderMoved
methods.comment: Notification that the domain folder was moved.

methods.name: domainFileMoved
methods.comment: Notification that the domain file was moved.

methods.javadoc: Notification that the setActive() method on the folder was called.
methods.name: domainFolderSetActive
methods.comment: Notification that the setActive() method on the folder was called.

methods.name: domainFileStatusChanged
methods.comment: Notification that the status for a domain file has changed.

params.name: fileIDset
params.comment:
if true indicates that the previously missing fileID has been
 established for the specified file.

methods.javadoc:
Notification that a new version of the domain object exists and the
 current one is no longer valid. Existing consumers should be immediately
 released and no additional use of the oldObject is permitted once this 
 method returns.  This is only called for domain objects which were
 opened for update.
@param file file whose object was replaced
@param oldObject old object that was replaced
methods.name: domainFileObjectReplaced
methods.comment:
Notification that a new version of the domain object exists and the
 current one is no longer valid. Existing consumers should be immediately
 released and no additional use of the oldObject is permitted once this 
 method returns.  This is only called for domain objects which were
 opened for update.

methods.name: domainFileObjectOpenedForUpdate
methods.comment: Notification that a domain file has been opened for update.

methods.name: domainFileObjectClosed
methods.comment: Notification that a domain file previously open for update is in the process of closing.

params.name: object
params.comment: domain object which was open for update

name: DomainFolderChangeListener
comment:
Methods for notifications when changes are made to a domain folder or
 a domain file.
